w01.title: The Village Herbalist
w01.quote: "Even the wolves hesitate to tread on her garden, knowing the peace she brings to the woods is worth more than a meal."
w01.origin: Born in the quiet hamlet of Willowmere, she discovered her gift for herbal magic at a young age.
w01.story: What began as gathering herbs for her grandmother's remedies grew into a deep connection with the natural world. Now she tends to the village, healing ailments both physical and spiritual with her carefully prepared tinctures.
w01.abilities: Nature Attunement, Healing Touch, Potion Brewing

w02.title: The Novice Cleric
w02.quote: "She prays so loudly the stained glass rattles, yet she has never seen the world outside the rectory walls."
w02.origin: Raised in the Temple of the Dawn, she took her vows at the earliest age permitted.
w02.story: Though still learning the ways of divine magic, her unwavering devotion has already caught the attention of the High Priestess. She believes that even the smallest prayer can move mountains.
w02.abilities: Divine Light, Minor Healing, Blessing of Protection

w03.title: The Steel Vanguard
w03.quote: "They say her heart is made of the same iron as her breastplate; neither has ever been pierced by an enemy blade."
w03.origin: Forged in the crucible of the Northern Border Wars.
w03.story: She rose through the ranks not through noble birth, but through sheer determination and an unbreakable will. Her armor bears the dents of a hundred battles, each one a life saved.
w03.abilities: Defensive Stance, Shield Bash, Rally Cry

w04.title: The Elven Scribe
w04.quote: "She knows the history of every dynasty for the last three thousand years, yet she still cannot find her quill when it is tucked behind her ear."
w04.origin: From the ancient libraries of Silverleaf Grove.
w04.story: She has spent three centuries cataloging the histories of mortal kingdoms, watching empires rise and fall from behind her quill. Her chronicles are considered the definitive record of the realm.
w04.abilities: Ancient Knowledge, Scroll Mastery, Memory Perfect

w05.title: The Dwarven Smith
w05.quote: "The sparks from her anvil are the only stars to be seen in the deep mines, and she burns brighter than any of them."
w05.origin: Heir to the legendary Ironforge clan.
w05.story: She broke tradition by leaving the mountain halls to study surface metalworking techniques. Now she combines dwarven craftsmanship with exotic materials to create weapons of unparalleled quality.
w05.abilities: Master Crafting, Flame Mastery, Rune Enchantment

w06.title: The Nekomimi Baker
w06.quote: "Her kneading technique is legendary, though customers do occasionally find a whisker in the sourdough."
w06.origin: Wandered into the village from the Eastern Provinces.
w06.story: With ears that twitch at every sound and an uncanny ability to predict what customers want, she has made the village bakery famous across three kingdoms. Her secret ingredient? A dash of feline intuition.
w06.abilities: Culinary Magic, Comfort Aura, Swift Reflexes

w07.title: The Royal Duelist
w07.quote: "She fights not to kill, but to humiliate. A pristine uniform at the end of a match is her greatest trophy."
w07.story: Undefeated in sixty-seven official duels, she serves as the Crown's judicial champion. Her blade has decided matters of law, honor, and succession—always with lethal grace.

w08.title: The Forest Ranger
w08.quote: "To track her is to chase the wind; by the time you spot the fletching of her arrow, she is already three trees away."
w08.story: She patrols the ancient woods where the boundary between the mortal realm and fae territories grows thin. Her arrows never miss, guided by the whispers of the trees themselves.
w08.abilities: Eagle Eye, Nature's Ally, Shadow Step

w09.title: The Kitsune Diviner
w09.quote: "Never ask a fox for the truth unless you are prepared to trade your secrets for a riddle that haunts you."
w09.origin: Last daughter of the Nine-Tailed Shrine.
w09.story: Her three tails mark her as a fox spirit of considerable age and power. She offers prophecies to those brave enough to seek her out, though her answers often come wrapped in riddles.
w09.abilities: Future Sight, Illusion Weaving, Spirit Fox Form

w10.title: The Tavern Brawler
w10.quote: "The local carpenter owes his entire fortune to the number of tables she breaks on a typical Friday night."
w10.origin: Rose to fame in the fighting pits of Port Crimson.
w10.story: What started as fighting for coin became a legend. She never uses weapons—claims they're unsporting. Her bare-knuckle style has humbled knights and monsters alike.
w10.abilities: Iron Fists, Thick Skin, Battle Fury

w11.title: The Shadow Assassin
w11.quote: "She is a whisper in the dark, a cold touch on the neck, and then... absolute silence."
w11.story: She is whispered about in courts and back alleys alike—a phantom who has never failed a contract. None have seen her face and lived to describe it.
w11.abilities: Shadow Meld, Death Strike, Poison Mastery

w12.title: The Dancer of the Dunes
w12.quote: "Kings have traded entire cities just to secure front-row seats to the Dance of the Seven Veils."
w12.origin: Chosen vessel of the Sand Goddess.
w12.story: Her dance summons sandstorms and parts dunes. What appears as performance is actually powerful elemental magic, passed down through an unbroken line of sacred dancers.
w12.abilities: Sand Dance, Desert Wind, Mirage Step

w13.title: The Barbarian Queen
w13.quote: "She wears the bitter northern frost as comfortably as a southern lady wears silk, and she cuts twice as deep."
w13.origin: United the warring Mountain Clans through blood and fire.
w13.story: She carved her throne from the bones of those who underestimated her. Now she leads the largest horde the north has ever seen, her war cry echoing across frozen peaks.
w13.abilities: Berserker Rage, War Cry, Indomitable Will

w14.title: The Dragon Sorceress
w14.quote: "Her scales are harder than diamond, and her vanity is twice as unbreakable as her scales."
w14.origin: Born from the pact between a mortal witch and an elder wyrm.
w14.story: Half-human, half-dragon, she commands power that terrifies even archmages. The scales that mark her skin shimmer with contained flames, and her eyes hold the wisdom of ages.
w14.abilities: Dragon Fire, Draconic Form, Ancient Magic

w15.title: The Goddess of Love
w15.quote: "To look upon her is to forget one's own name; mortals simply break under the weight of such perfection."
w15.story: She walks among mortals to remind them of love's true nature—not possession, but liberation. Her mere presence can mend broken hearts or kindle flames that burn for eternity.
w15.abilities: Divine Love, Heart's Truth, Eternal Bond
